reviewText: I thought this was a nice family movie to watch on the weekend when you have nothing to do and want to enjoy your down time.
Title: Love Songs

reviewText: This is a great movie enjoyed enjoyed, i have it on vhs but wanted it on dvd great picture on dvd good quality great actors, actresses love all the stars, please buy you will enjoy it.
Title: Love Songs

reviewText: I first saw this movie on tv and knew then that I must own it.  This is very good trilolgy.  To watch three wonderful actors direct each other in these short films was just fantastic.  If you are a collector, this is a must own.
Title: Love Songs

reviewText: I loved how the stories intertwined with each other and I love the all star cast. They were all the right ones for each part they played in this movie. It is a shame though that theses movies are not seen on the big screen.
Title: Love Songs

reviewText: Love Songs is a great movie--featuring three families dealing with situations in their lives. I believe you'll enjoy it.I highly recommend it.
Title: Love Songs

reviewText: I already had this movie on VHS, but I wanted to purchase it on DVD. I would say in a brief description that it is a movie about life's lessons. I especially liked how the characters intertwined in all of the stories(there are three). really good.
Title: Love Songs

reviewText: This is a very pleasant movie triology of Urban Life with great musical scores.It's a must see!!!
Title: Love Songs
